text.tspan: sin A = b sin A = h
sin B = a sin B = h
All sides are equal because Σ angles of all angles = 360
Also Σ of angles per triangle as divided by the purple
Per triangle: Σ angles = γ + 0.5α + xα = 180
Because the total of α at Protate is 1α and both triangles subtract
½α from the sum of angles they have to be equal therefore ½α.
That makes both triangles isosceles triangles with the sides to γ
